First let\'s start some Walkthrough of the section so you will know the basics.Here you can start random chatting to any person worldwide so in order to start the random chat you need to join to a room first. You can do it by clicking on the \'Join wait room \' button which will redirect you to the wait room.
During search of a person the status will change and you will be informed whenever new opponent will be found,or your opponent will left the conversation

Whenever you want to start the conversation,you can click on the highlighted button to start the conversation.If you are already inside the conversation,the button icon will be changed to the disconnect status,and you can disconnect whenever you want to.
This is the place where you will write to your opponent.Write a message and send it,as simple as that.
To send your typed message simply click on this button and your message will be sent to the connected opponent.
This is the place where your conversation will be visible as soon as you start one.
Thank you for passing the tutorial.Hope you will enjoy your time and meet a lot of new friends here.Enjoy your day! :)
You are not connected to wait room
Could not sent the message,try again...
We\'re sorry but your opponent was disconnected from the chat. \nYou can find new opponent by clicking top right button to search again.

Dear user,We have detected that your device belongs to HUAWEI manufacturer.Due to HUAWEI phones being deeply changed inside the OS,there is one thing you should do for the application to work properly. The issue considers to the notifications and background task not being received and started in the HUAWEI device.For the fix please follow the steps below: 

1)Ensure that device is not in the 'ULTRA-BATTER' mode. 

2)Add the application to protected apps of the device. 

For the Marshmallow and above devices do the next: 

3)Open 'Settings' 

4)Navigate to 'Advanced Settings' 

5)Click on the 'Battery Manager' 

6)You will see the block called 'Protected Apps',click on it. 

7)Find the 'KSocial' application in the list and switch the trigger ON. 

As soon as you did all the required steps,the text with the 'Protected' sign will appear below of the app. 

For Lollipop and below devices you should follow same steps except 4 and 5 steps.Just navigate through Settings->Protected Apps and do the rest steps as follows. 
We sincerely sorry if this could make you fell uncomfortable,but there is nothing more we can do except warn you. 
Thank you for your understanding.

The backup service let you save you'r messages remotely so you can access them any time and never loss any messages. Note that no messages are saved on our server during you'r chat experience and neither you'r messages saved here can be read from our end as all of the messages are encrypted strongly. 

It is strongly recommended to backup you'r messages regularly, as we are not storing any of you'r messages on the server. 

Note : you can always access this from settings whenever you wish to backup or restore.
Do not turn off the phone or quit the application during the process
All of you\'r local data will be erased with the remote one,proceed?
You\'r remote data will be overwritten,proceed?

Welcome to Mafia game. To be able to play like a pro you need to master the basic controls as well as basic idea of the game-play. So without further ado let's get started. 

 The game is divided into 2 main categories : Classic Mafia, and 'Yakudza' also known as Doctor and Maniac Players game. 

 For now the 'Yakudza' game is not available and will be released soon so we are going to discuss the basis of the Classic game type. 
The game consists of minimum 9 players : at least 3 mafia players with at least 1 KingPin and the rest are citizen players with at least 1 Sheriff player. 
 The purpose of the Mafia player is to eliminate citizens and try to negotiate with them as if he/she was citizen too,thus the mafia player has a little more advantage of shooting a desired player during the night. 
The idea of the citizen players is to eliminate all of the mafia members to win,as simple as it gets. 

 The Role of Mafia Players: 

 There are 3 mafia players as stated and all of them must shoot same person during the night. As soon as night has come,the mafia player will have ability to talk to each other in global chat so the citizens will not see their conversation. At that point,until the morning,all of the mafia members are obliged to shoot the same person, so the person will be counted as eliminated. If even one of them did not shot the same person,the shooting will be counted as missed and the citizen will be playing for another morning. Here are the scenarios where mafia will be counted as won when the below mentioned count of players with concrete roles are left: 1) Mafia-2,citizen-1 2) Mafia-3,citizen-2 3) Mafia-1,citizen-1 
 In all of these cases the mafia is considered to be a winner. 

 The citizens are winning only in the case of all mafia members to be eliminated through voting. 

\ The KingPing Role: 

 Basically talking about the Head of Mafia Players, we can say that the KingPin is the one who is deciding the victim for the night.


 The Sheriff Role: 

 The Ultimate help for citizens is the Sheriff Role. Sheriff can check one player each night to see that player's role,whether the player is from mafia the player is citizen.


 The Voting: 

 During the morning all of the players can vote by posting a vote candidate with the click of the desired participant in the room. Even mafia can vote and make voting. This is the only tool for citizens to eliminate the mafia player.


 The Ending: 

 At the end of the game,the winner players will be rewarded with concrete price which will vary from time to time.



 Enjoy you'r time! Wish you good luck!
